0x00008000.description: NBI DMA Buffer List Queue Register
0x00008000.name: NbiDmaBufferList

0x00000000.description: NBI DMA Buffer Completion SRAM Entry %d
0x00000000.name: NbiDmaBCSramEntry%d

0x00000000.description: NBI DMA Buffer Descriptor SRAM Entry %d
0x00000000.name: NbiDmaBDSramEntry%d

0x00000000.description: Configures the buffer list circular queue and provides status
0x00000000.name: BLQueCtrl0

0x00000008.description: Configures the buffer list circular queue and provides status
0x00000008.name: BLQueCtrl1

0x00000010.description: Configures the buffer list circular queue and provides status
0x00000010.name: BLQueCtrl2

0x00000018.description: Configures the buffer list circular queue and provides status
0x00000018.name: BLQueCtrl3

fields.description: Debug counter that increments when a BLQ Event is dropped due to a full BLQ Event FIFO. This counter saturates at all 1's
fields.name: BLQEventFullCnt

fields.description: Number of buffer descriptors resident in the buffer descriptor register FIFO
fields.name: BDFifoEntryCnt

fields.description: The Queue is full when set.
fields.name: BLQFull

fields.description: The queue is empty when set.
fields.name: BLQEmpty

fields.description: Defines the Size of the Circular Buffer List Queue
fields.name: BLQSize

fields.description: Hardware calculated value of the number of entries on the Buffer List Queue. A full Buffer List Queue has an entry count equal to zero, with the BLQFull flag set. An empty Buffer List Queue has an entry count equal to zero with the BLQEmpty flag set.
fields.name: BLEntryCnt

fields.description: Buffer List Queue Head Pointer. Points to the next entry to be read by hardware.
fields.name: BLHdPtr

fields.description: Buffer List Queue Tail Pointer. Points to the next entry to be written at the tail.
fields.name: BLTlPtr
